adHeader: Tutoring math/physics/chemistry college and high school
adDetails: Tutoring, high school and college level, Mathematics/Chemistry/Physics I have helped many students to understand difficult concept and apply them in solving problems. I have degrees in chemical engineering and computer science and I have tutored, taught these subjects for the last 10 years. I help students to become confident, enthusiastic. Available during the day and early evenings for one-on-one tutoring as well as tutoring groups of two or more. This can be done in home, at a library or any coffee house for college students as you prefer. Tutoring Subject(s): > Math: Algebra I and II, Geometry, Pre-Calculus, Math Analysis, Calculus AB and BC and Stats. > Chemistry/Physics: high school/ college/Honor/AP levels. > Review SAT/SAT II/AP test(s). Achievements: > I have helped many students to receive a score of 5 on AP Physics, Chemistry and Calculus. > I am familiar with teaching material in Lynbrook, Los Gatos, Monta Vista, Saratoga, Homestead and Harker high schools > Many of my students received highest scores in SAT II and AP tests > Some of my students see immediate results in a matter of weeks References available upon request. eMail me a contact phone number and subject area(s) you need help. - Chuck
